<theman.grimtown@...> writes:

> I came to the conclusion that I would be happy to take home
> perhaps five of the swords, the rest, some big names among them, were
> not for me. You will know that at the sale prices went through the
> roof, but I am still not convinced that a number of the swords were
> correct. 

Two of those I think the prices confirmed that most people thought were
not correct... there was a Kinju that seemed wrong to me, and that went
cheap, then there was a Yukimitsu tanto that also seemed wrong to me and
that also went for cheap. The nakago just didn't look right on this
tanto, and the workmanship in the blade was a bit pedestrian and not
what one would expect for this smith... in my opinion. 

A couple others were like this to me as well... the Yukimitsu daito I
had qualms about, and the Chogi wakizashi. 

I'm curious what your thoughts were about the other blades and which
were the five you'd like to have taken home?

- darcy
